Holiday Money Get in touch Book a video call Make an enquiry Call 0800 713 715 Help Get in touch Back HOT EXCLUSIVE View gallery / Back Dubrovnik Croatia Dubrovnik Dubrovnik Croatia Europe Croatian Coastal Charm 14 Night Fly, Stay & Cruise Package Overview Inclusions Cabin Types Terms & Conditions From the romance of Venice to the legacy of Athens, explore the Adriatic and Ionian seas with calls at Zadar, Split, and the sun-drenched island of Corfu. With extended calls in eight ports—you’ll have ample time to truly experience each destination. Cruise on Azamara Onward, your boutique hotel at sea, where practically everything is included and the atmosphere is laid-back. You can relax onboard on sun-drenched decks, in the refreshing pool, and revitalizing spa. There's never a dull moment onboard with celebrations, cultural performances, and cocktails! View more View less 14 Night Fly, Stay & Cruise Package from $ 9899 per person share twin Oceanview Stateroom Cruising with Azamara Cruises HOT EXCLUSIVE Sale Period : until 4pm 28 Nov 25 or until sold out Departs 30 Aug 26 flying from Auckland 2 Sep 26 | Cruise from Venice to Athens HOT Fly, Stay & Cruise Package Deal Inclusions Return Economy class flights from Auckland Shared transfer Venice airport to hotel 2 nights Venice including breakfast Shared transfer Venice hotel to port 10 night cruise^ onboard Azamara Onward from Venice to Athens 2 night Athens* including breakfast Private transfer Athens hotel to airport Azamara Cruises Onboard Inclusions Variety of Dining Venues & Room Service Beer, Wine, and Spirits All Day & Night Signature AzAmazing Evenings Unlimited Self-Service Laundry Tips & Gratuities Cruise itinerary Day 1: Venice (Fusina), Italy Venice (Fusina), Italy Embarks 6:00PM An independent city-state and major power during the Middle Ages and Renaissance, Venice consists of more than 100 small islands connected by arched bridges and is one of the world’s most beautiful cities. Day 2: Koper, Slovenia Koper, Slovenia Arrives: 8:00AM Departs: 10:00PM Koper is the gateway to an array of intercontinental adventures. Only 30 minutes away from Koper, Trek through the UNESCO World Heritage site of the Skocjan Caves, which features the largest underground canyon in the world. Or stay local and enjoy the charms of Koper itself, with historic sites like the 12th century St. Mary’s of the Assumption Cathedral, the Praetorian Palace. Day 3: Zadar, Croatia Zadar, Croatia Arrives: 09:00 AM Departs: 08:00 PM Perched on Adriatic Sea in Croatia, Zadar is a truly captivating city, where history-drenched cobblestone streets meet contemporary life, and are then surrounded by blue sea, green olive groves and white stone. Day 4: Hvar, Croatia Hvar, Croatia Arrives: 08:00AM Departs: 08:00PM With its fertile plains, fresh water springs, fields of lavender, fruit orchards, ancient olive trees and vineyards, it’s no wonder Hvar frequently appears on lists of the world’s most appealing islands. Day 5: Dubrovnik, Croatia Dubrovnik, Croatia Arrives: 08:00AM Departs: 10:00PM To visit Dubrovnik is to step back in time to the Middle Ages, as the town is one massive museum of fountains, palaces and churches, with thick walls that date back to the 13th century and encircle the city. Day 6: Kotor, Montenegro Kotor, Montenegro Arrives: 10:00AM Departs 08:00PM One of Europe’s best-preserved cities of medieval or Renaissance vintage, Kotor’s walls were constructed right into the slopes of the mountain behind it, making it an amazing sight on approach from the sea. Day 7: Corfu, Greece Corfu, Greece Arrives: 09:30 AM Departs: 09:00 PM With its millions of olive trees, scent of lemon blossoms and sapphire bay, Corfu is one of the most beautiful islands in the Mediterranean and is said to cast a spell upon those who land upon its shores. Day 8: Argostoli, Greece Argostoli, Greece Arrives: 08:00AM Departs: 05:00PM The capital and “heart” of the Greek Island of Kefalonia, Argostoli is a modern town with a traditional soul, with the famous Drogati Cave and underground Melissani Lake routinely topping must-see lists. Day 9: Monemvasia, Greece Monemvasia, Greece Arrives: 08:00AM Departs: 08:00PM One look at Monemvasia as you pull in to port and it’s easy to understand why locals nicknamed it The Rock. Shrouded by precipitous cliffs along the brilliant teal waters of the Myrtoan Sea, Monemvasia is a castle town suspended in history. Day 10: Chania, Crete, Greece Chania, Crete, Greece Arrives: 08:00AM Departs: 06:00 PM On the northwest side of Crete rests the old Venetian port of Chania with its mixture of Greek, Venetian and Ottoman influences on every corner: Minoan ruins, Byzantine churches and impressive frescos. Day 11: Athens (Piraeus), Greece Athens (Piraeus), Greece Debarks: 05:00 AM Home to the Acropolis, Athens has quite a reputation to live up to: Named for Athena, Goddess of Wisdom, the city is credited with being the cradle of European civilization and birthplace of democracy. Cabin Types Departs From Auckland from Auckland Club Oceanview Stateroom Two lower beds convertible to one Queen size bed, some staterooms feature sofa bed, 40” flat-screen TV, veranda, refrigerator with mini-bar, thermostat-controlled air conditioner, direct-dial telephone with voice mail, writing desk, in-room safe, and hand-held hairdryer. 170 square feet with picture window. Auckland Fly, Stay & Cruise Package from $9899 Per person based on share twin HOT EXCLUSIVE Includes Savings of $1500 per couple Travel 30 Aug - 14 Sep 26 Club Veranda Stateroom Two lower beds convertible to one Queen size bed. Comfortable sitting area with 40” flat-screen TV. Veranda. Refrigerator with mini-bar. Thermostat-controlled air conditioner. Direct-dial telephone with voice mail. Writing desk. In-room safe. Hand-held hairdryer. USB ports under bedside reading lamps. (175 square feet; veranda 40 square feet) Auckland Fly, Stay & Cruise Package from $11,899 Per person based on share twin HOT EXCLUSIVE Travel 30 Aug - 14 Sep 26 Please note: Stateroom images and features are samples only. Actual furniture, fixtures, colors, configurations and window/porthole views may vary. Terms & Conditions *City tax is additional and payable locally upon hotel check-in Athens EUR30 total per couple. ^A mandatory Cruise Fee applies per person for each disembarkation at a Greek port, and will be charged to the onboard cruise account: Corfu EUR5 Argostoli EUR5 Monemvasia EUR5 Crete EUR5 Athens EUR5 All cruise packages are based on Twin share, inside cabin and costs are per person. Availability is current as at 03 Nov 25 and deals are available until date shown or until sold out. Space is strictly limited and is subject to availability at time of booking. On board credit where shown is per cabin & must be spent on board and is not refundable in cash. All passengers are bound by the individual cruise lines terms & conditions, please ask your consultant for a full copy. Current Deals must be paid in full at time of booking or deposit dates as shown. All passengers must have a valid passport with more than 6 months validity at the end of their holiday. Travel insurance should be taken out at time of booking to cover in the event of any unforeseen cancellation. Included airfares are based on special non refundable economy fares, ground transfers are not included unless specified, any hotels included are on a room only basis unless specified. Hotels in certain destinations in Europe, USA and Asia may require local tourist taxes or resort fees payable at check in, We aim to give an indication of these where possible, but unfortunately you cannot pre pay this aspect of the hotel rate and must settle at check in. ESTA Visas are required for Itineraries visiting USA ,Canada, India, China, Vietnam, Schengen states & Sri Lanka. Visa costs are not included. Passports must be valid at least 6 months after the end of your holiday, If travelling on a non NZ passport other visas + NZ re-entry permits may also be required, please check with applicable embassy. Passport validity, Visas, Vaccinations and health requirements are the responsibility of the passengers. Individual cruise line T&C will apply based on the cruise line booked.
